column1:
share on x ab ava blazi. jun 21 at 9:19 pm i am so sorry for your loss, my prayers and thoughts are with you. patricia was a wonderful mother, grandmother, sister, aunt and loyal friend. i know you cherish the memories you have of her. she was a women of strength, wisdom and character. and of course, her laugh, that was so infectious and warm it drew people to her. she will be sorely missed. ava. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jun 21 at 9:01 pm sweet tranquility basket was purchased for the family of patricia mc. call dickson. share on x gp grover dade prescott. jun 21 at 8:36 pm grover dade prescott purchased the country basket blooms for the family of patricia mc. call dickson. share on x fw faith wray. jun 21 at 6:41 pm lit a candle in memory of patricia mc. call dickson. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x sb susan sheppard brown. jun 21 at 5:59 pm lit a candle in memory of patricia mc. call dickson. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x bb bob and patricia s. bennett. jun 21 at 5:41 pm lit a candle in memory of patricia mc. call dickson. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x cg carolyn gibbs. jun 21 at 5:10 pm lit a candle in memory of patricia mc. call dickson. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x ww wayne and vicky w. williamson. jun 21 at 4:26 pm lit a candle in memory of patricia mc. call dickson. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... currently no events are scheduled. no medias to show. 365 days of grief support. subscribe frazier & son funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
